Constructor Detail

WheelKeyListenerToggleAction

public WheelKeyListenerToggleAction(javax.swing.JPanel panel,
                                    java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener listener,
                                    int modifiersMask)
Creates KeyListener that adds and removes MouseWheelListener from indicated JPanel so that it's only active when the modifier keys (indicated by modifiersMask) are held down. Otherwise, the scrollbars automatically managed by the JScrollPanel would never see the wheel events.

Parameters:
panel - JPanel object that will be listening for MouseWheelEvents on demand.
listener - MouseWheelListener that listens for MouseWheelEvents
modifiersMask - the logical OR of the AWT modifier keys values defined as constants by the KeyEvent class. This has been tested with ALT_MASK, CTRL_MASK, and SHIFT_MASK.
